template.subject: No Action Required: Assessment / Evaluation Task Deleted
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
An assessment or evaluation task that was made available for you to complete in MEdTech Central has been forwarded to another assessor by %SUBMITTED_BY%.
To check if you have other assessments assigned to you, please click the following link:
%URL%
If you have received this email on an earlier date, please be advised that the link to this assessment has been revised, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
Sincerely, %CREATOR_FIRSTNAME% %CREATOR_LASTNAME% %CREATOR_EMAIL%
